name: Gargoyle
description: A grotesque, stone-skinned creature with leathery wings, sharp claws, and a fanged maw, resembling a statue when motionless.
memorable: The ability to blend in perfectly with stone environments until it strikes.
goals: To guard treasures or sacred sites, often animated by magic.
relations: Typically serves as guardians for ancient temples, castles, or tombs.
environment: Often found perched atop buildings or cliffs in urban or mountainous areas.
strengths: High Constitution offers exceptional durability, and claws can deal enhanced damage when diving.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma limit effectiveness in social situations.
attacks: Multiattack involving bite and claw strikes, capable of significant damage and tactical maneuvers.
most_powerful_ability: Diving Pounce allows it to knock targets prone and follow up with a bite attack.
senses: Possesses keen perception skills with a passive Perception score of 14.
skills: Skilled in perception, allowing it to notice hidden threats effectively.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and resistant to nonmagical physical damage.
Can remain motionless to effectively ambush prey.
Does not require air, food, or sleep, adding to its durability.
test_queries: predator that blends with stone environments
flying stone creature with sharp claws
guardian monster used to protect treasures
multiattack monster that pretends to be a statue
tough monster immune to poison and fatigue
